description: Agnes is Captain of the Tristain musketeers in service of Henrietta. Her character is a military woman who is a strict disciplinarian. She hates Mages, especially those who use the fire element. Agnes often says that mages should not become too dependent of their magic, because in battles, there will be no time to cast spells before the enemy`s swords and guns come into play.
name: Agnes Chevalier du Milan
